#summary Documentation on Google Mock (the SVN trunk version)
#labels Featured

This page lists all documentation wiki pages for Google Mock *(the SVN trunk version)*
- *if you use a released version of Google Mock, please read the documentation for that specific version instead.*

  * [V1_7_ForDummies ForDummies] -- start here if you are new to Google Mock.
  * [V1_7_CheatSheet CheatSheet] -- a quick reference.
  * [V1_7_CookBook CookBook] -- recipes for doing various tasks using Google Mock.
  * [V1_7_FrequentlyAskedQuestions FrequentlyAskedQuestions] -- check here before asking a question on the mailing list.

To contribute code to Google Mock, read:

  * [DevGuide DevGuide] -- read this _before_ writing your first patch.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/googletest/wiki/PumpManual Pump Manual] -- how we generate some of Google Mock's source files.
